info.title: Football Tournament Platform API
info.description:
## Overview
API for the Football Tournament Management Platform.

## Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT authentication. Include the access token in the Authorization header:
`Authorization: Bearer <access_token>`

## User Roles
- **ADMIN**: Full platform access
- **ORGANIZER**: Can create and manage tournaments
- **PARTICIPANT**: Can manage clubs and register for tournaments

## Rate Limiting
- Standard endpoints: 100 requests per minute
- Authentication endpoints: 10 requests per minute

minTeams.description: Minimum number of teams required for the age group to be played

locationId.description: Location ID for this age group

groupsCount.description: Number of groups for this age category

expiresInDays.description: Number of days until the code expires. If not provided, code will not expire.

reviewNotes.example: All documents verified and in order.

registrationIds.description: Array of registration IDs to process

reviewNotes.description: Notes for all registrations being processed

fromTournamentId.description: Limit invitations to teams from specific past tournament
